entries.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<system>
  <!-- Content in between markers will be preserved if codegen is rerun -->

  <domain_schedule>
    <domain name="domain_1" length="10" />
    <domain name="domain_2" length="100" />
    <domain name="domain_1" length="10" />
    <domain name="domain_3" length="100" />
    <domain name="domain_1" length="10" />
    <domain name="domain_4" length="100" />
    <domain name="domain_1" length="10" />
    <domain name="domain_5" length="100" />
    <domain name="domain_0" length="560" />
  </domain_schedule>

  <protection_domain name="producer_p_p_producer_MON" domain="domain_2">
    <program_image path="producer_p_p_producer_MON.elf" />
    <protection_domain name="producer_p_p_producer" domain="domain_2" id="1">
      <program_image path="producer_p_p_producer.elf" />
      <map mr="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_1_Memory_Region"
           vaddr="0x10_000_000"
           perms="rw"
           setvar_vaddr="write_port_queue_1"
      />
      <map mr="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_2_Memory_Region"
           vaddr="0x10_001_000"
           perms="rw"
           setvar_vaddr="write_port_queue_2"
      />
      <map mr="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_5_Memory_Region"
           vaddr="0x10_002_000"
           perms="rw"
           setvar_vaddr="write_port_queue_5"
      />

      <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER producer_p_p_producer -->
      <!-- END CONTENT MARKER producer_p_p_producer -->
    </protection_domain>

    <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER producer_p_p_producer_MON -->
    <!-- END CONTENT MARKER producer_p_p_producer_MON -->
  </protection_domain>

  <protection_domain name="consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON" domain="domain_3">
    <program_image path="consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON.elf" />
    <protection_domain name="consumer_p_s1_consumer" domain="domain_3" id="1">
      <program_image path="consumer_p_s1_consumer.elf" />
      <map mr="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_1_Memory_Region"
           vaddr="0x10_000_000"
           perms="r"
           setvar_vaddr="read_port_queue_1"
      />

      <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s1_consumer -->
      <!-- END CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s1_consumer -->
    </protection_domain>

    <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON -->
    <!-- END CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON -->
  </protection_domain>

  <protection_domain name="consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON" domain="domain_4">
    <program_image path="consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON.elf" />
    <protection_domain name="consumer_p_s2_consumer" domain="domain_4" id="1">
      <program_image path="consumer_p_s2_consumer.elf" />
      <map mr="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_2_Memory_Region"
           vaddr="0x10_000_000"
           perms="r"
           setvar_vaddr="read_port_queue_2"
      />

      <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s2_consumer -->
      <!-- END CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s2_consumer -->
    </protection_domain>

    <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON -->
    <!-- END CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON -->
  </protection_domain>

  <protection_domain name="consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON" domain="domain_5">
    <program_image path="consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON.elf" />
    <protection_domain name="consumer_p_s5_consumer" domain="domain_5" id="1">
      <program_image path="consumer_p_s5_consumer.elf" />
      <map mr="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_5_Memory_Region"
           vaddr="0x10_000_000"
           perms="r"
           setvar_vaddr="read_port_queue_5"
      />

      <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s5_consumer -->
      <!-- END CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s5_consumer -->
    </protection_domain>

    <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON -->
    <!-- END CONTENT MARKER consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON -->
  </protection_domain>

  <protection_domain name="pacer" domain="domain_1">
    <program_image path="pacer.elf" />

    <!-- BEGIN CONTENT MARKER pacer -->
    <!-- END CONTENT MARKER pacer -->
  </protection_domain>

  <memory_region name="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_1_Memory_Region"
                 size="0x1_000" />

  <memory_region name="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_2_Memory_Region"
                 size="0x1_000" />

  <memory_region name="top_impl_Instance_producer_p_p_producer_write_port_5_Memory_Region"
                 size="0x1_000" />

  <channel>
    <end pd="pacer" id="61" />
    <end pd="producer_p_p_producer_MON" id="61" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="producer_p_p_producer_MON" id="60" />
    <end pd="producer_p_p_producer" id="60" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="pacer" id="59" />
    <end pd="consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON" id="59" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON" id="58" />
    <end pd="consumer_p_s1_consumer" id="58" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="pacer" id="57" />
    <end pd="consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON" id="57" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON" id="56" />
    <end pd="consumer_p_s2_consumer" id="56" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="pacer" id="55" />
    <end pd="consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON" id="55" />
  </channel>

  <channel>
    <end pd="consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON" id="54" />
    <end pd="consumer_p_s5_consumer" id="54" />
  </channel>

  <!-- BEGIN MSD CONTENT MARKER -->
  <!-- END MSD CONTENT MARKER -->
</system>

# Do not edit this file as it will be overwritten if codegen is rerun

override MICROKIT_SDK := $(abspath ${MICROKIT_SDK})

SYSTEM_MAKEFILE ?= system.mk

export CPU = cortex-a53
export QEMU = qemu-system-aarch64

export AR := ar
export CC := clang
export DTC := dtc
export LD := ld.lld
export RANLIB := llvm-ranlib

export TOP_DIR := $(abspath $(dir ${MAKEFILE_LIST}))
export TOP_BUILD_DIR := $(abspath build)

export CRATES_DIR := $(TOP_DIR)/crates

export TARGET := aarch64-none-elf

# By default we make a debug build so that the client debug prints can be seen.
export MICROKIT_CONFIG ?= debug

export MICROKIT_SDK := $(abspath $(MICROKIT_SDK))
export MICROKIT_TOOL := $(abspath $(MICROKIT_SDK)/bin/microkit)
export MICROKIT_BOARD_DIR := $(abspath $(MICROKIT_SDK)/board/$(MICROKIT_BOARD)/$(MICROKIT_CONFIG))


IMAGE_FILE := $(TOP_BUILD_DIR)/loader.img
REPORT_FILE := $(TOP_BUILD_DIR)/report.txt

all: ${IMAGE_FILE}

.PHONY: check_microkit
check_microkit:
	@if [ -z "$(strip $(MICROKIT_BOARD))" ]; then \
		echo "MICROKIT_BOARD must be specified"; \
		exit 1; \
	fi
	@if [ -z "$(strip $(MICROKIT_SDK))" ]; then \
		echo "MICROKIT_SDK must be specified"; \
		exit 1; \
	fi

qemu ${IMAGE_FILE} ${REPORT_FILE}: check_microkit $(IMAGE_FILE) ${TOP_BUILD_DIR}/Makefile FORCE
	${MAKE} -C ${TOP_BUILD_DIR} $(notdir $@)

clean:: ${TOP_BUILD_DIR}/Makefile
	${MAKE} -C ${TOP_BUILD_DIR} clean

clobber:: clean
	rm -rf $(TOP_DIR)/build

${TOP_BUILD_DIR}/Makefile: $(SYSTEM_MAKEFILE)
	mkdir -p ${TOP_BUILD_DIR}
	cp $(SYSTEM_MAKEFILE) ${TOP_BUILD_DIR}/Makefile

FORCE:

# Do not edit this file as it will be overwritten if codegen is rerun

MICROKIT_TOOL ?= $(MICROKIT_SDK)/bin/microkit

CFLAGS := -mcpu=$(CPU) \
	-mstrict-align \
	-ffreestanding \
	-nostdlib \
	-g3 \
	-O3 \
	-Wall -Wno-unused-function -Werror -Wno-unused-command-line-argument \
	-I$(MICROKIT_BOARD_DIR)/include \
	-target $(TARGET)

LDFLAGS := -L$(MICROKIT_BOARD_DIR)/lib
LIBS := --start-group -lmicrokit -Tmicrokit.ld --end-group

SYSTEM_FILE := $(TOP_DIR)/microkit.system

IMAGES := producer_p_p_producer.elf producer_p_p_producer_MON.elf consumer_p_s1_consumer.elf consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON.elf consumer_p_s2_consumer.elf consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON.elf consumer_p_s5_consumer.elf consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON.elf pacer.elf
IMAGE_FILE = loader.img
REPORT_FILE = report.txt

UTIL_OBJS = printf.o util.o

TYPES_DIR = $(TOP_DIR)/types
TYPE_OBJS := $(TOP_DIR)/build/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_1.o $(TOP_DIR)/build/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_2.o $(TOP_DIR)/build/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_5.o

# exporting TOP_TYPES_INCLUDE in case other makefiles need it
export TOP_TYPES_INCLUDE = -I$(TYPES_DIR)/include

TOP_INCLUDE = $(TOP_TYPES_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/util/include

all: $(IMAGE_FILE)
	CHECK_FLAGS_BOARD_MD5:=.board_cflags-$(shell echo -- ${CFLAGS} ${MICROKIT_BOARD} ${MICROKIT_CONFIG}| shasum | sed 's/ *-//')

${CHECK_FLAGS_BOARD_MD5}:
	-rm -f .board_cflags-*
	touch $@

%.o: ${TOP_DIR}/util/src/%.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ -I$(TOP_DIR)/util/include

$(TOP_DIR)/build/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_1.o: $(TOP_DIR)/types/src/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_1.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)


$(TOP_DIR)/build/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_2.o: $(TOP_DIR)/types/src/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_2.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)


$(TOP_DIR)/build/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_5.o: $(TOP_DIR)/types/src/sb_queue_event_data_port_port_queues_struct_i_5.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)


# monitor
producer_p_p_producer_MON.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/producer_p_p_producer/src/producer_p_p_producer_MON.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/producer_p_p_producer/include

# user code
producer_p_p_producer_user.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/producer_p_p_producer/src/producer_p_p_producer_user.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)/ -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/producer_p_p_producer/include

producer_p_p_producer.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/producer_p_p_producer/src/producer_p_p_producer.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/producer_p_p_producer/include

# monitor
consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s1_consumer/src/consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s1_consumer/include

# user code
consumer_p_s1_consumer_user.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s1_consumer/src/consumer_p_s1_consumer_user.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)/ -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s1_consumer/include

consumer_p_s1_consumer.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s1_consumer/src/consumer_p_s1_consumer.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s1_consumer/include

# monitor
consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s2_consumer/src/consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s2_consumer/include

# user code
consumer_p_s2_consumer_user.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s2_consumer/src/consumer_p_s2_consumer_user.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)/ -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s2_consumer/include

consumer_p_s2_consumer.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s2_consumer/src/consumer_p_s2_consumer.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s2_consumer/include

# monitor
consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s5_consumer/src/consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s5_consumer/include

# user code
consumer_p_s5_consumer_user.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s5_consumer/src/consumer_p_s5_consumer_user.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE)/ -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s5_consumer/include

consumer_p_s5_consumer.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s5_consumer/src/consumer_p_s5_consumer.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ $(TOP_INCLUDE) -I$(TOP_DIR)/components/consumer_p_s5_consumer/include

pacer.o: $(TOP_DIR)/components/pacer/src/pacer.c Makefile
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@ -I$(TOP_INCLUDE)

producer_p_p_producer_MON.elf: producer_p_p_producer_MON.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

producer_p_p_producer.elf: $(UTIL_OBJS) $(TYPE_OBJS) producer_p_p_producer_user.o producer_p_p_producer.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON.elf: consumer_p_s1_consumer_MON.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

consumer_p_s1_consumer.elf: $(UTIL_OBJS) $(TYPE_OBJS) consumer_p_s1_consumer_user.o consumer_p_s1_consumer.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON.elf: consumer_p_s2_consumer_MON.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

consumer_p_s2_consumer.elf: $(UTIL_OBJS) $(TYPE_OBJS) consumer_p_s2_consumer_user.o consumer_p_s2_consumer.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON.elf: consumer_p_s5_consumer_MON.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

consumer_p_s5_consumer.elf: $(UTIL_OBJS) $(TYPE_OBJS) consumer_p_s5_consumer_user.o consumer_p_s5_consumer.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

pacer.elf: $(UTIL_OBJS) $(TYPE_OBJS) pacer.o
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $^ $(LIBS) -o $@

$(IMAGE_FILE): $(IMAGES) $(SYSTEM_FILE)
	$(MICROKIT_TOOL) $(SYSTEM_FILE) --search-path $(TOP_BUILD_DIR) --board $(MICROKIT_BOARD) --config $(MICROKIT_CONFIG) -o $(IMAGE_FILE) -r $(REPORT_FILE)


qemu: $(IMAGE_FILE)
	$(QEMU) -machine virt,virtualization=on \
			-cpu cortex-a53 \
			-serial mon:stdio \
			-device loader,file=$(IMAGE_FILE),addr=0x70000000,cpu-num=0 \
			-m size=2G \
			-nographic

clean::
	rm -f *.o
